articles.author: Henry Foy, Max Seddon, Polina Ivanova
articles.title: Russia detains 'General Armageddon' in crackdown on pro-Wagner elites - Financial Times
articles.description: Sergei Surovikin was known to have had good relations with warlord Yevgeny Prigozhin
articles.content:
Top Russian army general Sergei Surovikin has been detained as the Kremlin cracks down on Wagner sympathisers following the militias failed mutiny last week.
Surovikin, a senior Russian general know… [+3940 chars]

articles.author: Dr. Alfredo Carpineti
articles.title: Check Out These Breathtaking Entries In The Astronomy Photographer Of The Year Competition 2023 - IFLScience
articles.description: The competition is now in its 15th year and continues to deliver incredible pictures!
articles.content: In just a few months, the Royal Observatory Greenwich will crown the winners of Astronomy Photographer of the Year. To tease the momentous occasion, they have shared the shortlist selection from over… [+1246 chars]

articles.title: Genomic screening of 16 UK native bat species through conservationist networks uncovers coronaviruses with zoonotic potential - Nature.com
articles.description: Certain bats species have previously been identified as ancestral sources of coronaviruses that infect humans but there is limited data on the genomic diversity or zoonotic potential of viruses infecting bats in the UK. Here, the authors use deep sequencing&n…
